### User Story
As a user, I want to ... so that ...

### Acceptance Criteria
- Given ...
- When ...
- Then ...

### Definition of Done
- [ ] Acceptance criteria met
- [ ] Tested in QA
- [ ] No critical bugs
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
